trends: There have been no other sightings in Leipsic
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was jogging down a dark, country road thinking about UFOs and aliens and wishing they would appear when suddenly a bright green fireball came streaking down from the sky. It had a short tail behind it and lit up the clouds before vanishing. A couple minutes later I saw a bright star-like object falling slowly from the sky in almost the same location. It did not have any tail at all nor did it pulsate or burn up like a meteor would have. It just fell straight down almost to the ground before disappearing. I thought it was a pretty cool coincidence that it showed up right as I was thinking about aliens. It was almost like they were giving me a sign. Of course it could have just been a couple of meteors. Who knows?
Summary: Bright green fireball followed by falling star.
